MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts, affecting properties in Hirst Gardens and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.08pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault on Shottskirk Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.06pm on Tuesday 27th October 2020.
